This is the home of the Ubuntu translations knowledgebase, where you'll find all information around translating Ubuntu.

==== Frequently Asked Questions ====

''Frequently asked questions about translating Ubuntu and using Launchpad for translations''

* <nowiki>[[https://answers.launchpad.net/ubuntu-translations/+faqs|Ubuntu Translations FAQ]]</nowiki>
* <nowiki>[[https://answers.launchpad.net/rosetta/+faqs|Launchpad Translations FAQ]]</nowiki> — ''Launchpad Translations is the collaborative online tool we use to translate Ubuntu''
* <nowiki>[[..-TranslatorsQuestions|Old Ubuntu Translations FAQ]]</nowiki> — ''deprecated, but left here for reference purposes. The content should be moved to the <nowiki>[[https://answers.launchpad.net/ubuntu-translations/+faqs|Ubuntu Translations FAQ]]</nowiki>''

==== Policies ====

''Set of policies governing the teams in the <nowiki>[[https://translations.launchpad.net/+groups/ubuntu-translators|Ubuntu Translators]]</nowiki> <nowiki>[[https://help.launchpad.net/Translations/JoiningATranslationGroup|translation group]]</nowiki>. The translation of Ubuntu is only possible for the teams in this group.''

==== Special translations ====

''These are translations that do not follow the usual <nowiki>[[Translations-TranslationLifecycle|translation lifecycle]]</nowiki>''.

* !LibreOffice: Translation happens entirely in upstream, please <nowiki>[[http://www.libreoffice.org/get-involved/localizers/|follow their instructions]]</nowiki>
* Firefox: Translation happens entirely in upstream, please <nowiki>[[https://wiki.mozilla.org/L10n/|follow their instructions]]</nowiki>
* <nowiki>[[Ubufox|Ubufox]]</nowiki>
* <nowiki>[[BrowserStartPage|Browser start page]]</nowiki>
* <nowiki>[[BrowserStartPageOffline|Offline browser start page]]</nowiki>
* <nowiki>[[UbuntuDocs|K-Ubuntu documentation]]</nowiki> — Note: add a description to the "Assistive Tools" string translation
* <nowiki>[[DDTP|Long package descriptions]]</nowiki>
* <nowiki>[[Installer|Ubuntu Installer]]</nowiki>
* <nowiki>[[InstallerTimezones|Installer timezones]]</nowiki>
* <nowiki>[[PackagesDotUbuntuDotCom|packages.ubuntu.com]]</nowiki>
* ISO codes: Please translate <nowiki>[[http://pkg-isocodes.alioth.debian.org/|upstream]]</nowiki>, we will only sync from Debian and won't use the translations from Launchpad directly.
* <nowiki>[[ReleaseNotes|Release Notes]]</nowiki>
* <nowiki>[[https://translations.launchpad.net/wubi|WUBI]]</nowiki>
* <nowiki>[[..-Wanted|Wanted]]</nowiki> — translations needed, but not doable in Launchpad
* <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/UbuntuHebrewTranslators/CLI | Command Line Interface packages ]]</nowiki> useful for disabling translations for RTL languages
* CUPS: Please translate <nowiki>[[http://www.cups.org/documentation.php/doc-1.5/translation.html|upstream]]</nowiki>, we will only sync from there and won't use the translations from Launchpad directly.
* <nowiki>[[https://translations.launchpad.net/ubuntu/precise/+source/apt/+translations|apt]]</nowiki>: please coordinate the translation with <nowiki>[[Translations-Upstream-Debian|Debian upstream]]</nowiki>
* <nowiki>[[https://translations.launchpad.net/ubuntu/precise/+source/dpkg/+pots/dpkg|dpkg]]</nowiki>: please coordinate the translation with <nowiki>[[Translations-Upstream-Debian|Debian upstream]]</nowiki>
* <nowiki>[[https://translations.launchpad.net/ubuntu/precise/+source/e2fsprogs|e2fsprogs]]</nowiki>: please coordinate the translation with the <nowiki>[[Translations-Upstream-Other-TranslationProject|Translation Project upstream]]</nowiki>

==== Utilities and translation helping tools ====

* <nowiki>[[Nightmonkey | Nightmonkey]]</nowiki> - Helps you translate package description
* <nowiki>[[http://l10n.ubuntu.tla.ro/karmic-report/ | Karmic Translations Report ]]</nowiki> - a better view over translation templates (search, see upstream and sort over all templates)
* <nowiki>[[https://edge.launchpad.net/ubuntu-translations/ubuntu-translations-tools | Ubuntu Translations Tools ]]</nowiki> various script to help you with translation related task (ex. search string in local installed translations)
